snippet: Some of the most powerful figures in the New York Region, as identified by the Metro reporters of The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: For this special issue, the Metropolitan section asked the reporters who cover the New York region to identify the powerful figures on their beats, and to explain what gave them clout and where they fell on the chain of influence in New York. A separate article identifies those figures who earned the highest spot in our power pantheon: heavy hitters. The rest, arranged alphabetically below, are either established players or rising stars. Design | Antenna Design (Rising Star)

headline.main: The Power Players of New York
